**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 [Xulgath Hardscale](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2123) **Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 53 **Perception** +21; (23 when using for initiative) **Languages** [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 **Items** _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, [moderate elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3), necklace of bone and gems worth 100 gp, _[lesser sturdy shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327)_ (Hardness 10, HP 80, BT 40), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 32 (34 with shield raised) **Fort** +25 **Ref** +22 **Will** +19 **HP** 215 **Hardscale Shield Stance** A hardscale always has their shield raised as if they had used the Raise a Shield action, as long as they meet that action's requirements.
**Powerful Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 32 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature is also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all [xulgaths'](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) stenches for 1 minute.
**Shield Warden** If the hardscale has their shield raised, they can Shield Block when an attack is made against an adjacent ally. If they do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of the hardscale.
**Aggressive Block** **Trigger** The hardscale uses the Shield Block reaction, and the opponent that triggered Shield Block is adjacent to the hardscale and is not more than one size larger than it; **Effect** The hardscale makes an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the opponent. This Shove doesn't increase the hardscale's multiple attack penalty. If they roll a critical failure, they get a failure instead. If they roll a success, they get a critical success instead.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** At the beginning of each of their turns, the hardscale receives an additional reaction that they can use only for Shield Block. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _warhammer_ +24 ([deadly 2d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 3d8+11 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +23, **Damage** 3d6+11 piercing **Melee** claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d4+11 slashing **Ranged** javelin +21 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+11 piercing **Hammer Mastery** The hardscale deals an extra 1d8 damage with weapons with the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait, and weapons with the shove trait gain the [deadly 2d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait when the hardscale uses them (both the extra weapon damage die and the deadly trait have already been included in the hardscale's _warhammer_ Strike above).
name: Xulgath Hardscale
